channel.title: Truly Interesting
channel.description:
Truly Interesting is a podcasts started by Noah Roger in 2020. Released every Friday starting Friday 3rd January 2020, it will give a humourus and detailed analysis into intriguing topics which may relate to Current News Events or it may be just something I thought of which turns out to be interesting. en Noah Roger
0 Help Me Out
You can suggest topics to me by emailing trulyinteresting@noger.co.uk
Sun, 22 Dec 2019 11:00:00 +0000 0 60
